mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_EDU_COMPLETE WHERE EDU_NO = #{edu_no} AND USER_NO = #{user_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_EDU_COMPLETE SET END_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EDU_NO = #{edu_no} AND USER_NO = #{uesr_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EUD_COMPLETE VALUES( EDU_NO = #{edu_no}, USER_NO = #{user_no} SCORE = -1, ANSWER = '미응시', INPUT_DT = SYSDATE, START_DT = SYSDATE, END_DT = #{end_dt} )
